data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
In the minute 1, Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 7, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Real Madrid.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Real Madrid.
Karim Benzema of Real Madrid smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 17, Real Madrid push forward at Reale Arena and Dani Carvajal gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Real Sociedad defence.
At Reale Arena, Real Madrid are penalized for being offside.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 19, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 21, In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Ander Barrenetxea (Real Sociedad) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Raphael Varane's header is off-target for Real Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Real Sociedad's area.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
In the minute 29, At Reale Arena, Ferland Mendy has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Free kick in a good position for Real Madrid!
Real Sociedad's Aihen Munoz has been booked in San Sebastian.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 37, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Real Madrid are pushing forward but Vinicius Junior's finish is wide of the goal.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema breaks free at Reale Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in San Sebastian.
Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 43, Robin Le Normand (Real Sociedad) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Real Sociedad pushes forward through Alexander Isak, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 43, Real Sociedad are coming forward and Alexander Isak gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
In the minute 45, In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Sebastian.
The first half has been concluded at Reale Arena.
In the minute 46, Juan Martinez Munuera has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Real Madrid.
Ander Barrenetxea of Real Sociedad gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 47, Juan Martinez Munuera awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 51, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
In San Sebastian, Karim Benzema of Real Madrid is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 56, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Real Madrid drives forward and Dani Carvajal gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 57, Real Sociedad's Aihen Munoz misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Mikel Oyarzabal for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
In the minute 60, Martin Odegaard (Real Madrid) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Alexander Isak with David Silva. This is the first substitution made today by Imanol Alguacil.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 69, In San Sebastian Real Madrid drive forward through Toni Kroos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Real Madrid.
Casemiro is replacing Martin Odegaard for the away team.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 70, Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a first substitution, with Federico Valverde replacing Luka Modric.
Marvin Park is on a sub for Rodrygo for Real Madrid.
In the minute 71, In San Sebastian Real Madrid attack through Toni Kroos. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Adnan Januzaj is replacing Mikel Oyarzabal for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Imanol Alguacil is making the team's third substitution at Reale Arena with Jon Bautista replacing Ander Barrenetxea.
In the minute 76, Real Madrid drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
In San Sebastian, Real Sociedad push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 80, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ferland Mendy (Real Madrid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 83, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Dani Carvajal (Real Madrid) has received a yellow card from Juan Martinez Munuera.
Real Sociedad are caught offside.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
In the minute 87, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Sociedad drive upfield and David Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Real Madrid defender.
In the minute 88, Attention is being given to Real Madrid’s Raphael Varane and play has been suspended briefly.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Real Madrid's Raphael Varane looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Karim Benzema for the away team is judged to be offside.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
That's full-time at Reale Arena. The final score is 0-0.
Real Sociedad make their fourth substitution with Urko González replacing Ander Guevara.
The away team replace Vinicius Junior with Sergio Arribas.
